sentences.sContent: He crouched in the shadows near the doorway.
sentences.sCn: 他蹲在门道近旁的阴暗处。

sentences.sContent: Paula crouched down and held her hands out to the fire.
sentences.sCn: 葆拉蹲下来，把手伸向火堆。

remMethod.val: 注意不要和couch(n. 长沙发)相混

trans.tranOther: to lower your body close to the ground by bending your knees completely
